title: About BSP Group
lead: Official importer, manufacturer and distributor of pet products in Ukraine since 2020.
position: One of the largest distributors of pet products in Ukraine

brands.distributed_note: We have over 1000 SKUs in total. We also distribute other brands across Ukraine and in Zakarpattia.

sections.history: BSP Group is an official importer, manufacturer and distributor of pet products. Founded in 2020. Despite the pandemic, war and crises, the company is constantly developing..
sections.brands_intro: Today we have two of our own brands, Dasty and Spiky, and four exclusive brands throughout Ukraine, namely Fincsi, Cattos, Pretty Cat, Thor.
sections.exclusive_region: We hold exclusive distribution rights in Zakarpattia: TM HealthyPet, TM Hidog, Nutra 5 Stars, Exclusion, Quattro, Nature’s Protection, Healthy Snack, AlfPet, Miss Kis. Over 1000 SKUs in total.
sections.distribution: We cooperate with retail chains, distributors, wholesale and retail clients. In certain regions, we have exclusive partners.
sections.logistics: We have built professional logistics that enable fast and cost-efficient deliveries to every corner of Ukraine — from a single bag to tens of tons.
sections.quality: All products are verified and have quality certificates.
sections.position: Today we are one of the largest distributors of pet products in Ukraine.
sections.promise: We can meet the needs of any customer.
sections.gratitude_partners: We are grateful to everyone for the cooperation and work every day for our current and future partners.
sections.gratitude_army: We thank the Armed Forces of Ukraine for the opportunity to work and for safety.
